element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm calculates the variance in each cell and its surrounding ones, using an increasing search radius. The minimum radius needed to reach a given variance is the radius of variance of the cell for that variance value.

element.name: MAXRADIUS
element.text: If values are too homogeneous, the given variance might not be reached and the analysis window might grow up to a very large radius. Use this parameter to set a maximum radius, so if this radius is reached, the algorithm will not look any further and will return it as the radius of variance for the analyzed cell.

element.name: STDDEV
element.text: The standard deviation to search for.

element.name: METHOD
element.text: The units for the resulting values: cells or map units
